cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the U.S House of Representatives on December 8, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5705, Technical Corrections Legislation

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 187 (Monday, October 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BENTZ:
H.R. 5705.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8, clause 18.
[Page H5872]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions reclassified to title 34, United States Code.
